attributes.action: legislate for the regulation of Veterinary Practices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who purport, by word or deed, to be Veterinary Nurses must be properly qualified, and unqualified people must not be allowed to treat animals in a veterinary practice unsupervised. Further, the owners of Veterinary practices must take responsibilty for mistakes made in their name, and animals' medical records must be regarded as legal documents, and not altered for the benefit of the Veterinary practice in cases of dispute.
